title: I.Sicily inscription 000349

provenanceFound._: Gualtherus reports it (among those already lost) as found by one Hieronymus Porthuso 'secundum circum maximum', presumably indicating the area of the amphitheatre

provenanceLost._: Reported lost already at the time of Gualtherus (1624)
